scripts.download-spec: curl https://api-preview.brokerize.com/openapi.json > openapi_dl.json &&  node -e 'console.log(JSON.stringify(JSON.parse(require("fs").readFileSync("openapi_dl.json").toString()),null,4))' > openapi.json && rm openapi_dl.json
scripts.generate: npm run clean-swagger & npx @openapitools/openapi-generator-cli generate -i openapi.json -g typescript-fetch -o ./src/swagger
scripts.download-and-generate: npm run download-spec && npm run generate
